lover.description:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§d You madly fall in love with §b&player&§d.
§dIf they die, you will kill yourself in despair.
§dYou can send heart points to your soul mate with §b/ww donate §d[% of life to send] [optional:player who will receive the hearts]
lover.lover_death: §d&player& by love, joins them in their grave
lover.not_enough_players: there aren't enough players to add lovers
lover.not_lover: You can only donate hearts to your lover
lover.polygamy: Due to a lack of players compared to the number of players, polygamy is disabled
lover.complete: You sent §b&number&§r % of your life to §b&player&
lover.100: You cannot send 100% or more of your life

cursed_lover.description:
§6Werewolf §7➽§c A destructive link between §6&player&§c and you has emerged. You cannot win together, even if you are in the same team.
 §c You have an additional heart and NoFall while both of you are alive.
cursed_lover.death_cursed_lover: Your cursed lover is dead, you loose all your bonus effects
cursed_lover.not_enough_players: There aren't enough players to add cursed lovers

amnesiac_lover.not_enough_players: There aren't enough players to add amnesiac lovers

serial_killer.items: A Sharpness III book, a Protection III book and a Power III book
serial_killer.power: Whenever you kill a player, you get an additional permanent heart and a golden apple.
serial_killer.limit: Armor, bow and sword enchantement limit (§b+1§f)

guardian_angel.wait: You will know your ward in §b&player&§f
guardian_angel.effect: 15 hearts as long as your ward is alive, 12 if he's dead
guardian_angel.show_command: You may, thrice during the game, give your ward a Regeneration effect for 20 seconds §b/ww regen
guardian_angel.description: You have to protect a randomly picked ward and win with him. If he were to die, you §lwin as part of the village.
guardian_angel.description_patch: You have to protect a randomly picked ward and win with him. If he were to die, you §lhave to win alone.
guardian_angel.protege_death: Your protégé died, you lose 3 hearts and you now have to win with the Village
guardian_angel.protege_death_patch: Your ward has been killed. You lose 3 hearts and now have to win alone
guardian_angel.get_regeneration: You receive the effect Regeneration from your Guardian Angel for 20 secondes
guardian_angel.no_protege: You don't have a protégé yet
guardian_angel.disconnected_protege: Your protégé is not currently online
guardian_angel.perform: Your ward receives Regeneration, you may use this ability §b&number&§r more times

amnesiac_werewolf.description: You do not have access to the werewolf list and the other werewolves won't see you in the list as long as you haven't killed a villager. You are NOT considered a werewolf as long as you haven't killed a villager

werewolf.go_to_the_werewolf_camp: You are now a member of the §4Werewolves §b/ww ww
werewolf.new_werewolf: A new player joined the pack §b/ww ww
werewolf.see_others: You now know the Werewolves §b/ww ww
werewolf.list_not_revealed: The Werewolves' list has not been revealed yet

grimy_werewolf.description: The first player you kill will appear as a Werewolf on his death
grimy_werewolf.perform: The player §b&player&§f was a §b&role&§f. Due to your power, his role has been disguised as a Werewolf
grimy_werewolf.actualize: A Grimy Werewolf died. He did disguise the death of a §b&role&

wild_child.description: After receiving your role, you chose a master. If he dies, you become a member of the Werewolves.
wild_child.design_model: You have to choose a master §b/ww master§r. You have §b&timer&

sister.effect: Resistance when you're less than §b&number&§f blocs from a sister.
sister.description: If a sister dies, you may chose to see either the name or the role of her murderer.
sister.name: §bthe name§f
sister.reveal_killer_name: Your sister has been slain by §b&player&
sister.reveal_killer_role: Your sister was slain by a §b&role&

wolf_dog.description: §aVillager§f form : The Werewolves see you as a werewolf in their list. However, you do not know the werewolves. Be careful, the information roles will see you as a werewolf. You can read and send messages in the werewolf chat
wolf_dog.transform: You may change into your werewolf form through §b/ww change§f (cannot be reversed), you have §b&timer&
wolf_dog.time_over: You can no longer choose your form. As such, you will stay as a Villager
wolf_dog.description_2: §cWerewolf§f form : The Werewolves do not see you in their list. However, you do know the werewolves. The information roles see you as a Villager. You do not have Strength during the night.

stud.description: The first time you die, you come back to life in love with the person who killed you

witch.items: one potion of healing, two potions of damage, one potion of regeneration and one potion of strength
witch.description: Once during the game, you may bring a player back to life.
witch.resuscitation_message: §b&player&§r is dead, to revive them, §6Click here §r(You have §b7sec§r)
witch.auto_rez_witch: the witch can bring herself back to life

little_girl.effect: When you take of your armor during the night, you become invisible.
little_girl.description: When you are Invisible, you leave a trace of blue particles visible by Mischievous Werewolves. Inversely, you can find them by the red particles they leave in their wake. You are also able to see the Werewolves' chat
little_girl.remove_armor: It's night, remove your armor to become invisible
little_girl.remove_armor_perform: You are now invisible. Put your armor back to be visible
little_girl.soon_to_be_day: It will be day time in §b30§r secondes
little_girl.ability_disabled: Your power has been deactivated, you become visible again

troublemaker.description: Once during the game, you may teleport a player to a random location on the map. When you die, all players are scattered around the map.
troublemaker.chat: You can send messages in the werewolf chat. However, you cannot see it's content
troublemaker.troublemaker_death: A Troublemaker died, all players are randomly teleported
troublemaker.get_switch: You have been teleported by a troublemaker

citizen.description: You may, twice during the game, chose to see the ballots and, once, cancel the result.
citizen.cancel_vote_message: You may cancel the vote §b&number&§r time.
citizen.see_vote_message: Youmay look at the ballots §b&number&§r more time(s).

angel.angel_choice: You can decide to be either
angel.angle_choice_click: You just choose §b&form&§b§f. You will know your target in §b&timer&
angel.fallen_choice:
If you chose §bFallen Angel§f,
 you obtain 12 hearts and a random target will be given to you.
 If you kill it, you will have 15 hearts until the end of the game.
angel.guardian_choice:
If you chose §bGuardian Angel§f,
 you obtain 15 hearts and have to protect a randomly designated ward and win with him/her.
 If your ward dies, you go down to 12 hearts and have to win with the Villagers.
angel.guardian_choice_patch:
If you chose §bGuardian Angel§f,
 you obtain 15 hearts and have to protect a randomly designated ward and win with him/her.
 If your ward dies, you go down to 12 hearts and have to win alone.
angel.sweet_angel: The Guardian angel wins with the Village if his ward dies

mystical_werewolf.no_message: The Mystic Werewolf is not allowed to send messages in the Werewolf chat
mystical_werewolf.description: Whenever a Werewolf died, you will obtain the role and the name of a player who isn't in your team.
mystical_werewolf.werewolf_death: A Werewolf just died, you get to know that §b&player&§f is §b&role&
mystical_werewolf.ability_disabled: Your power has been deactivated; you do not get any information

rival.extra: You are allowed a Power §b&number& bow
rival.description:
When the Lovers are announced, you will obtain the roles of two players in love with each other. In §b&timer&§r, you will obtain a list of 5 players containing the names of the two lovers. 
If you kill a lover, you will take his place and will have to win with his lover. 
However, if they die, you will have to win alone and you lose 5 hearts (a heart container is returned to you every minute). You do know the direction in which to find the Cupid if he is part of the game.
rival.lover: The lovers are a §b&role1&§f and a §b&role2&§f.
rival.error: No lovers have been found for your role (Rival)
rival.find_lovers: The lovers are among the following players : &player1&, &player2&, &player3&, &player4&, &player5&
rival.lover_death: The lovers are dead, you now have to win alone and lose two permanent hearts.

fox.effect: Three minutes of speed after each kill
fox.description:
You are able to sniff other players in order to know if they are a Werewolf or not. You can only sniff players who are less than §b&number&§f blocks away from you for §b&timer&§f.
You have §b&number&§f sniffs.
fox.smell_message: You may sniff a player §b/ww sniff§. If you are already sniffing someone, he will be replaced by the new target and progression will be reset to 0. You have §b&number&§r sniffs remaining
fox.warn: He will be informed in 5 minutes that you sniffed him
fox.werewolf: &player&§4 is a membre of the Werewolves.§f He will be informed that he has ben sniffed in 5 minutes
fox.not_enough_near: You aren't close enough to the player you are smelling
fox.smell: You have been sniffed by a §bFox§f 5 minutes ago

raven.description: Your vote counts double. At dawn, you may curse a player who will receive Jump Boost II for a day.
raven.curse_message: You may curse a player for the day §b/ww curse§r, you have §b&timer&
raven.get_curse: You have been cursed by the Raven. You now have Jump Boost until the next morning

village_idiot.power_on: You are §aable to§f come back to life
village_idiot.power_off: You §ccannot§f come back to life anymore
village_idiot.announce: The Village Idiot §b&player&§r has come back to life.
village_idiot.description: When you are killed by a player who isn't part of the Werewolves, you come back to life and all players are told your role, but you lose two permanent hearts.

villager.miner_desc: You have the §bMiner§f kit : a diamond pickaxe efficiency II
villager.black_smith_desc: You have the §bBlacksmith§f kit : an anvil and 10 bottles of xp
villager.book_seller_desc: You have the §bLibrarian§f kit : 8 books and 10 bottles of xp
villager.golem_desc: You have the §bGolem§f kit : 15 iron and 3 books Unbreaking III
villager.archer_desc: You have the §bBowman§f kit : 6 strings and 64 arrows
villager.priest_desc: You have the §bPriest§f kit : 3 golden apples
villager.description: You do not have any powers

assassin.items: a Sharpness III book, a Protection III book and a Power III book
assassin.limit: armor, bow and sword enchantement limit (+1)

falsifier_werewolf.description: §fYou have a different display role every day in order to deceive the villagers.

thief.details: To see the details of your role §b/ww role
thief.description: You obtain the role of the first person you kill and will have to win with its team.

imitator.description: You obtain the role of the first person you kill.

detective.description: Every morning, you may examine two players to know if they are or not in the same team.
detective.inspection_message: Inspect two players §b/ww inspect§r you have §b&timer&
detective.opposing_camp: &player1& and &player2& §2are not in the same team
detective.already_inspect: At least one of the players has already been inspected

naughty_little_wolf.effect: Strength and Speed (during the night), Night Vision. 2 hearts of absorption after each kill

chatty_seer.description: In the morning, you may see the team a player belongs to. However, if it's a villager, you lose 3 Hearts and won't be able to use your power the next day. The message will be displayed in the global chat.
chatty_seer.see_perform: A Chatty Seer has spied on a member of the §b&camp& camp

infect_father_of_the_wolves.description: You may bring back to life a player who was killed by a werewolf. This player will become a part of the werewolves while keeping his original powers.
infect_father_of_the_wolves.infection_message: §b&player&§r is dead, to infect §6Click here §r(You have §b7sec§r)

seer.disable: You have spied on a Villager yesterday. Your power will be available again tomorrow
seer.description: In the morning, you may see the team a player belongs to. However, if it's a villager, you lose 3 Hearts and won't be able to use your power the next day.
seer.see_camp_message: Discover a player's team §b/ww see§r you have §b&timer&
seer.see_perform: You have spied on a member of the §b&camp& camp
seer.not_enough_life: You don't have enough life to spy on someone
seer.see_villager: You just spied on a villager and thus lose 3 hearts and cannot use your power the next time

priestess.description: During the day, You may chose to learn to which team a player belongs in exchange for two permanent hearts. While you are alive, the werewolves have a probability of 20% to see the role of a dead person while this is 80% for the villagers. After you died, those probabilities are reversed. Neutral roles have a 95% probability of seeing the role
priestess.werewolf_death: A Werewolf you discovered died. You get 1 heart back
priestess.perform: Discover the role of a player who is at less than §b&number&§r blocks of you with §b/ww spec§r you have §b&timer&
priestess.distance: You have to be at less than 10 blocs of the player

oracle.description: Once per day, you may know the current aura of a player of your choice.
oracle.perform: Discover the current aura of a player with §b/ww oracle§r you have §b&timer&

protector.description: Every morning, you may decide to protect a player. He will receive resistance and NoFall until dawn
protector.protection_message: Protect a player for the day §b/ww protect§r you have §b&timer&
protector.get_protection: The Protector is protecting today, you now have Resistance and NoFall

guard.description: Every morning, you can chose to protect a player. If he is killed by a Werewolf, he'll come back to life, but you won't be able to use your power anymore. You may protect each player only once
guard.protect: The guard is protecting you. As such, you come back to life
guard.resurrection: The player you were protecting just came back to life. You don't have your power anymore
guard.message: Protect a player for the day §b/ww protect§r you have §b&timer&

bear_trainer.description: At dawn, you growl once for each Werewolf in a §b&number&§f blocks radius around you. Growls are displayed in global chat.

avenger_werewolf.power: 7 Hearts at the beginning. Whenever a recorded Werewolf dies, you gain an additional heart container.
avenger_werewolf.description: Whenever you meet another Werewolf at less than §b&number&§f blocs, he is recorded.
avenger_werewolf.remove: §b&player&§f was among the werewolves you recorded. You gain an additional heart container

fallen_angel.wait: You will know your target in §b&timer&§f
fallen_angel.power: 12 hearts, 15 if you kill your target.
fallen_angel.deadly_target: You killed your target, you gain 3 extra hearts
fallen_angel.deadly_target_by_other: Your target has been slain by another player, you cannot obtain your additional hearts anymore

white_werewolf.description: You are infiltrated among the Werewolves.

cupid.none: §cNone§f, to make two people fall in love §b/ww lovers
cupid.items: A Power II, Punch I Book, 64 arrows, 3 strings
cupid.description: You have to win with your lovers. If the were to die, you win as a villager.
cupid.extra: You are allowed a bow Power §b&number&
cupid.lover_designation_message: You have to designate two Lovers, §b/ww lovers§r, you have §b&timer&

siamese_twin.description: You have been separated from your brother at birth, but keep a strong link to him. Your hearts above the fifth are linked.

alpha_werewolf.description: Your name is visible for all other Werewolves in the wolf chat.
alpha_werewolf.effect: 2 ♥ of Absorption for 5 minutes at the beginning of each night.

mischievous_werewolf.effect: Invisibility while taking off your armor during the night, Strength during the night otherwise
mischievous_werewolf.description: While you are invisible, you leave a trace of red particles visible by the §bLittle Girl§f. Inversely, you can see them by the blue particles they leave behind.

elder.available: You do §astill have§f your second life.
elder.not_available: You do §cno longer§f have your second life.
elder.description: You do have a second life. You will lose your resistance the first time you die. But careful, if a villager kills you, you will lose three permanent hearts.

flute_player.full: This player has a full inventory, he cannot receive a pipe
flute_player.wait: You have to wait §bone day§f before giving another pipe
flute_player.craft_description: To craft a pipe, surround a stick with gold ingots in a crafting table
flute_player.description: Once you craft a pipe, every player at less than §b&number&§f blocs of you will slowly become charmed (1% every 6 seconds).
flute_player.power: You may craft §badditional§f pipes and give them to other players once per day by §bright-clicking§f them. If the player finds the pipe in his inventory, it's effect is cancelled. A player carrying a pipe will §bunknowingly§f charm players around him.
flute_player.transmit: You gave a pipe to §b&player&§f you have §b&number&%f pipes remaining
flute_player.find: You discovered a pipe you were carrying, it doesn't have any effect anymore
flute_player.find_flute: §b&player&§f discovered you §bpipe§f, it doesn't affect him anymore
flute_player.effect: If a §bcharmed§f player is near you you have §bResistance§f. If all players are charmed, you get a permanent §bStrength§f effect
flute_player.day: You may again give a pipe to someone (you currently have §b&number&§f pipes)
flute_player.craft: You crafted an additional pipe (you currently have §f&number&§f), right-click a player to give him the pipe. He will charm players near him as long as he doesn't discover the pipe in your inventory
flute_player.perform: You crafted §byour pipe§f, you now charm people who are at less than §b&number&§f blocs of you

librarian.description: §b&number&§f time during the game, you may ask a player to write you a book through §b/ww book§f. When you die, all books you received are published
librarian.perform: You just sent a book to §b&player&
librarian.message: The §bLibrarian§r wishes for you to write him a book. Click here
librarian.prohibit: You are not authorized to write a book
librarian.waiting: You are already expecting a book from that player
librarian.death: A §bLibrarian§r just died, the books he received are revealed :

comedian.description: You have three masks, one of Strength, one of Resistance, and one of Speed. Every morning, you may chose to put on (or not) a mask for the day. Each mask can be used only once.
comedian.wear_mask_message: You may now chose to put on a mask for the day. Use §b/ww mask§f 1, 2 or 3 (respectively : Resistance, Speed and Strength). You have §b&timer&
comedian.wear_mask_perform: You just put the §b&mask&§r mask on

trapper.description: Every morning, you will be able to track the position of a different player.
trapper.tracking_message: You now track the position of a new player §b/ww track
trapper.get_track: A Trapper is tracking you today

succubus.description: You may charm a player who will have to win with you. If you die, the charmed players dies in your stead. The time necessary to charm is §b&timer&
succubus.charming_message: You may now chose a player to charm §b/ww charm
succubus.charming_perform: §b&player&§r is totally charmed, if you die he will die in your place
succubus.get_charmed: The succubus §b&player&§r charmed you, you now have to win with her. If the succubus were to die, you die in her stead.
succubus.free_of_succubus: You have been freed from your Succubus, but at what price...
succubus.not_enough_near: You aren't close enough to the player you are trying to charm

shaman.description: Whenever a player dies, you have 30 seconds to choose if you wish to sacrifice a heart container in order to randomly obtain the role or the name of the dead player. You always see a dead players real role
shaman.cannot_use: You can no longer do this
shaman.not_enough_life: You do not have enough life to do this
shaman.choice_message: A player died. §bClick here§r to obtain an information about hum in exchange of a heart container. You have §b30§r seconds.

vote.player_already_voted: This player has already been voted
vote.vote_deactivate: Due to the number of players, Votes are disabled
vote.vote_result: §b&player&§r is the player who was voted most often§r : §b&number&§r. He loses 5 hearts
vote.no_result: No player have been voted more than ounce
vote.vote_time: It is time to vote §b/ww vote§r You have §b&timer&

lone_wolf.message: You become a lone wolf. You now have to win alone. To help you in this task, you have 4 additional permanent hearts (within a limit of 15 hearts maximum)

announcement.death_message_with_camp: §b&player&§r died, he was a member of the §b&role&

announcement.troll: Well, the joke has gone on for long enough ! Here's your real role :

global.victory_couple: Lovers can only win as Lovers

maps.name: §bMaps§f Configuration
maps.new: Create a new §bWorld§f with a roofed

exposed.name: Exposed
exposed.description:
Twice during the game 
(in the intervals [65~80 min] and [100~115 min]), 
a randomly chosen player has his nickname 
displayed in the chat next to 3 roles
 still present in the game. 
Among those 3 roles are : his role, a role from a different team, 
a randomly chosen role among the remaining.
A player cannot be exposed twice during a game.

loot_box.name: Loot Box
loot_box.description:
Once during the game, when a Villager dies, 
a series of caches appear.
One of them contains the name of an enemy of the Villagers
loot_box.villager_death: [§5Loot-Box§r] Before dying, §b&player&§r spawned§b&&number&§r caches on the map, one of them contains the name of an enemy of the Village

infection.name: Infection
infection.description:
Once during the game, infects a player at random.
The infection happens between 1h and 1h15 after the roles, 
if less than half the players are Werewolves.
infection.message: [§5Infection§r] A random player has been infected

amnesic.name: Amnesiac
amnesic.message: [§5Amnesiac§r] You discover that you are actually are a Werewolf. You will know a Werewolf every five minutes
amnesic.description:
When the Werewolves' list is announced, 
a non-Werewolf player is chosen at random 
and becomes Amnesiac.
If he is hit by a Werewolf he will 
become part of their pack 
and will know a Werewolf 
every five minutes. 
If he is not transformed, he stays in 
his original team
amnesic.new: §b&player&§f is a Werewolf, next name in five minutes

triple.name: Love Triangle
triple.description: A third person has joined the Lovers
triple.message: [§5Love Triangle§r] A third player has joined the lovers

drunken_werewolf.name: Drunk Werewolf
drunken_werewolf.description:
A Werewolf chosen at randome 
does not have the right Werewolves 
list

bearing_ritual.name: Fall Guys
bearing_ritual.message: [§5Fall Guys§r] For a day, everyone has NoFall
bearing_ritual.end: [§5Fall Guys§r] End of the random event
bearing_ritual.description:
Once during the game, for one day, 
all players have NoFall. 
This event triggers between 1h and 1h40

putrefaction.name: Putrefaction
putrefaction.message: [§5Putrefaction§r] For a day, water causes damage
putrefaction.description:
Once during the game, for a day, 
water deals damage.
This event triggers between 1h and 1h20

god_miracle.name: Divine Miracle
god_miracle.message: [§5Divine Miracle§r] A player has been brought back to life
god_miracle.description:
Once during the game,
 a killed player is brought back to life

swap.name: Swap
swap.message: [§5Swap§r] Two people had their roles swapped
swap.concerned: Your role has been swapped §b/ww role§f do discover your new one
swap.description:
Once during the game,
 before the Werewolves know their teammates
 2 roles are swapped

check.ability_disabled: Your powers have been deactivated, you cannot perform this action
check.two_distinct_player: You have to select two different players
check.player_not_found: The player doesn't exist, is disconnected or is already dead
check.parameters: Number of parameters needed as input §b&number&
check.not_in_judgement: The player is not in Purgatory
check.number_required: The command needs a number as input
check.already_get_power: The player has already been affected by your ability yesterday
check.permission_denied: You don't have the permission to use this command
check.death_spectator: Spectator mode is enabled only for dead players
check.not_in_game_player: The player isn't in the game
check.spectator_disabled: Spectators are disabled for this game
check.console: This command is not usable via the console
check.state: You cannot use this command at this point of the game

update.up_to_date: The plugin WW UHC is updated
update.snapshot: You are in Snapshot version of the WW UHC

description.werewolf: Strength (during the night), Night Vision, 2 hearts of absorption and a minute of speed after every kill

statistics.message: Discover the summary of the preceding game by §bClicking here
